video.name: Aloo Baingan - Potato Eggplant Curry - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Easy Potato Eggplant Curry - Aloo Baingan. 
Full Recipe here :-- http://www.veganricha.com/2016/01/aloo-baingan-recipe.html

1 Pot Indian Spiced Curried Eggplants and Potatoes. Serve with rice or flatbread, or make a wrap or a bowl with Dal. Add chickpeas to make it a meal.

****************************************­*******
Music by  Tre Houston - Tell ya that i love ya - wedding song Instrumental.

recipeIngredient: 1  medium eggplant (chopped small, or 8 or more small eggplants, quartered)
1  large tomato (crushed, finely chopped or about 1 cup diced canned tomato)
cayenne (pure red chili powder or garam masala to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When hot, add cumin and mustard seeds and cook them until cumin seeds change color and get fragrant. A few seconds or a minute depending on how hot the plan and oil are.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When hot, add cumin and mustard seeds and cook them until cumin seeds change color and get fragrant. A few seconds or a minute depending on how hot the plan and oil are.

recipeInstructions.text: Add curry leaves carefully. Add garlic ginger and chili and cook for a minute or until the garlic is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add curry leaves carefully. Add garlic ginger and chili and cook for a minute or until the garlic is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the coriander powder and turmeric and mix in. Add potatoes and eggplants and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the coriander powder and turmeric and mix in. Add potatoes and eggplants and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes, salt and water and mix in. Cover and cook for 15 minutes. Stir, reduce heat to medium-low and continue to cook until the eggplants and potatoes are tender to preference. about 15 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes, salt and water and mix in. Cover and cook for 15 minutes. Stir, reduce heat to medium-low and continue to cook until the eggplants and potatoes are tender to preference. about 15 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a good sprinkle of cayenne or garam masala or both, and cilantro and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a good sprinkle of cayenne or garam masala or both, and cilantro and serve.
